So who's gonna bring in the bots to transform into predators?
  ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
  From: dachande 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sund=
ay, December 24, 2000 8:01 AM
  Subject: Re: Tripredacus (Predacons should =
read)


  I love those movies, the Destron base is named Sulaco and LV-426,=
 both from Aliens. And Dachande had a Alien beast mode, so does Jynx and Pr=
aetorian and the Four Nightmares will soon.
    ----- Original Message ----=
- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, Dece=
mber 24, 2000 12:05 PM
    Subject: Re: Tripredacus (Predacons should read)=



    What's with the "Alien" reference?

    Nostromo was Ripleys first s=
hip.
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: dachande 
      To: nb=
wrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Saturday, December 23, 2000 5:13 PM
      Sub=
ject: Tripredacus (Predacons should read)


      Yanshosh and I, so far, a=
re roleplaying these guys. When they combine they are under each of our con=
trol, but make sure to read the posts of the others so they know what is go=
ing on.
       
      ::Sea Clamp/Cicadon/Ramhorn::
       
          The i=
nfamous members of the Tripredacus Council had learned of what was going on=
 on past Earth. They decided that it was nessary for their personal interve=
ntion. Preparing a ship to leave they had a crew of about forty bots, none =
with Beast Modes. They themselves had reengineered their bodies to accomada=
te Beast Modes and a Gestalt.
          The ship, Nostromo, left the dock. =
It created a Transwarp conduit and went through. Soon they were all through=
. Sea Clamp was at the helm, Cicadon was at the Navagation, and Ramhorn was=
 manning the weapons systems. Almost all of the lights had gone out, all th=
at was on were red warning lights, which would make it difficult for anybod=
y to see. The crew had been eradicated, no chance for rebellion. But, smart=
ly, their Sparks had not been extinguised, they had been stored in small ca=
psules for later use. Tripredacus had been looking for the last remaining o=
nes when they saw something they did not expect. The Ark. In Space. They kn=
ew this was a great chance, but the last of the remianing Predacons attacke=
d them at that point. They did not have the chance to destroy the Ark. But =
they would. The last of the rebels had been ejected from the ship.
        =
  The Nostromo had a easy landing. Tripredacus dismanteled the thruster sys=
tem, Sea Clamp spoke up in a raspy voice. "No one goes home."
          "Ag=
reed," The other two said. They decided to look for the other Predacons on =
this planet, and begin their plan of the destruction of the Ark, and the Au=
tobots.




        eGroups Sponsor
